snippet: Kobe Bryant’s first N.B.A. game since he was injured last season was heralded by a two-minute video produced by the Lakers and nonstop discussions on Los Angeles sports radio.
abstract: Toronto Raptors defeat Los Angeles Lakers, 106-94; Kobe Bryant in his first NBA game since he was injured last season is heralded by a two-minute video produced by the Lakers and nonstop discussions on Los Angeles sports radio.
lead_paragraph: Kobe Bryant’s first N.B.A. game since he was injured last season was heralded by a two-minute video produced by the Lakers and nonstop discussions on Los Angeles sports radio.

headline.main: Hollywood Buildup Prepared the Way for Bryant’s Return to the Floor
headline.print_headline: Hollywood Buildup Prepared the Way for Bryant’s Return to the Floor
